TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SPSocialFeedManager extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides methods for creating microblog posts, modifying threads, and consuming feeds.

remarks.para: For more information about how to work with feeds, see Work with social feeds in SharePoint 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Server.Social.SPSocialThread CreatePost (string targetId, Microsoft.Office.Server.Social.SPSocialPostCreationData creationData);

.method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Office.Server.Social.SPSocialThread CreatePost(string targetId, class Microsoft.Office.Server.Social.SPSocialPostCreationData creationData) cil managed
Public Function CreatePost (targetId As String, creationData As SPSocialPostCreationData) As SPSocialThread
public: Microsoft::Office::Server::Social::SPSocialThread ^ CreatePost(System::String ^ targetId, Microsoft::Office::Server::Social::SPSocialPostCreationData ^ creationData);

Docs.param: An ID that represents the endpoint for the root post, reply post, or site feed post.
The new post's content and related information.
Docs.summary: Creates a microblog post or reply.
Docs.returns: A digest of the new or modified thread.

remarks.para: The value of the parameter can be one of the following:

item.description: a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) to publish a root post for the current user.
The thread ID of a post to reply to.
The URL of a site feed to post to (for example: http://<siteURL>/newsfeed.aspx).

Public Function DeletePost (postId As String) As SPSocialThread
public: Microsoft::Office::Server::Social::SPSocialThread ^ DeletePost(System::String ^ postId);

Docs.param: The unique identifier of the post to delete.
Docs.summary: Deletes the specified microblog post.
Docs.returns: A digest of the modified thread, or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if the whole thread is deleted.

remarks.para: If the post is a root post, the whole thread is deleted.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Server.Social.SPSocialFeed GetFeed (Microsoft.Office.Server.Social.SPSocialFeedType type, Microsoft.Office.Server.Social.SPSocialFeedOptions options);

.method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Office.Server.Social.SPSocialFeed GetFeed(valuetype Microsoft.Office.Server.Social.SPSocialFeedType type, class Microsoft.Office.Server.Social.SPSocialFeedOptions options) cil managed
Public Function GetFeed (type As SPSocialFeedType, options As SPSocialFeedOptions) As SPSocialFeed
public: Microsoft::Office::Server::Social::SPSocialFeed ^ GetFeed(Microsoft::Office::Server::Social::SPSocialFeedType type, Microsoft::Office::Server::Social::SPSocialFeedOptions ^ options);

Docs.param: The feed type to retrieve.
Feed retrieval options such as date range and sort order.
Docs.summary: Gets a feed of activity by the current user, and optionally by followed people and content or by the user's organization.
Docs.returns: The requested feed based on the specified parameters.

remarks.para: The feed type specifies whether to include activity from followed people and content or from the user's whole organization. For more information, see Overview of feed types

If a thread contains more than two replies, the server returns a digest of the thread that contains only the two most recent replies. (Thread digests have the thread attribute applied.) If you want to get all the replies in a thread, call the method and pass in the thread ID.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Server.Social.SPSocialFeed GetFeedFor (string actorId, Microsoft.Office.Server.Social.SPSocialFeedOptions options);
.method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Office.Server.Social.SPSocialFeed GetFeedFor(string actorId, class Microsoft.Office.Server.Social.SPSocialFeedOptions options) cil managed
Public Function GetFeedFor (actorId As String, options As SPSocialFeedOptions) As SPSocialFeed
public: Microsoft::Office::Server::Social::SPSocialFeed ^ GetFeedFor(System::String ^ actorId, Microsoft::Office::Server::Social::SPSocialFeedOptions ^ options);

Docs.param: The unique identifier of the user or team site to retrieve the feed for. For a user, you can use the account name or email address. For a site feed on a team site, use the format http://<server>/<teamSite>/newsfeed.aspx.
Feed retrieval options such as date range and sort order.
Docs.summary: Gets a feed of activity by the specified user or team site.
Docs.returns: The requested feed for the specified user or team site.

remarks.para: You can only retrieve the feed type for a user who is not the current user.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Server.Social.SPSocialThread GetFullThread (string threadId);
.method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Office.Server.Social.SPSocialThread GetFullThread(string threadId) cil managed
Public Function GetFullThread (threadId As String) As SPSocialThread
public: Microsoft::Office::Server::Social::SPSocialThread ^ GetFullThread(System::String ^ threadId);

Docs.param: The unique identifier of the thread to retrieve. This can be the thread ID or the root post ID.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the specified thread with unabbreviated post and actor information.
Docs.returns: The specified thread with unabbreviated post and actor information.

remarks.para: To optimize performance, the server typically returns a digest thread that contains only the two most recent replies. If you want to get all the replies in the thread, you can call GetFullThread and pass in the ID of the returned digest thread.

Docs.param: true to clear the current user's unread mention count, otherwise false.
Feed retrieval options such as date range and sort order.
Docs.summary: Gets a feed of threads that mention the current user.
Docs.returns: The requested feed based on the specified parameters.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Server.Social.SPSocialThread LockThread (string threadId);
.method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Office.Server.Social.SPSocialThread LockThread(string threadId) cil managed
Public Function LockThread (threadId As String) As SPSocialThread
public: Microsoft::Office::Server::Social::SPSocialThread ^ LockThread(System::String ^ threadId);

Docs.param: The unique identifier of the thread to lock.
Docs.summary: Locks the specified thread.
Docs.returns: A digest of the thread with the modified thread attributes.

remarks.para: In the UI, the Reply and Like links are removed from a locked thread and a Locked status is shown. However, the thread can be unlocked from the UI.
